Journal Story: Ordered my new tent from Zpacks on 2/24/16. I have been advised that Zpacks will be able to get the tent to me just prior to the start of my hike.If the tent arrives with no quality control issues I should be in good shape with a few days to practice my set up.

As May approaches quickly I'm struck with all the little things that I have to get together prior to my hike.There are the domestic chores that must be caught up and so many other preparations to be make.I feel fortunate to have backpacked for so many years,confident in my skill set and with my choices in gear that have evolved over the years.I've sold off much of my gear that I had collected over the past few years to other backpackers in need of good equipment at a fair price and in return I was able to offset my new tent expense.I'm going to attempt to do something towards the cause every day so that I'm not overwhelmed closer the beginning of my hike.Wish me luck on that.I have forgone my garden this year as I won't be around to tend it, which frees up a lot of time.

What a great day here in SW VA.the temperature is 67 and sunny.I'm planning on doing an overnight soon nearby on a section of the AT.The weather will change again soon,Winter will have a grip for a while.From what I'm seeing in journals there are going to be a good number out there this year. I'm still hoping my alternative starting point helps to avoid some of the bigger crowds.

I wanted to update my journal for my attempt at a 2016 thru-hike.Break-a-leg and myself continue as as as section hikers at this time.My wife became ill prior to our planned departure so a decision was made to forgo the trip.We both plan to try again but. At this time we are unsure when.
